name: ksmf
description: Modular Microframework for create minimalistic web application or REST API

scripts.type: npx -p typescript tsc ./index.js --target ES2022 --module commonjs --declaration --allowJs --checkJs --emitDeclarationOnly --esModuleInterop --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --resolveJsonModule --outDir types

author: Antonio Membrides Espinosa
